T02TD1880E:99a-1: shr'i gu hya sa m'a dza sya manydzu shr'i s'a dha nam //
T02TD1880E:99a-3: dpal gsang ba 'dus ba'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD1880E:99a-4: dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1880E:99a-5: chos dang longs sbyong sbrul ba'i sku //
T02TD1880E:99a-6: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can //
T02TD1880E:99a-7: ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1880E:99a-8: rtog pa ma lus kun las grol //
T02TD1880E:99a-9: thams cad ngo bo thams cad du //
T02TD1880E:99a-12: 'gro ba'i byang chub thob pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1880E:99a-13: de yi sgrub pa'i cho ga mchog //
T02TD1880E:99a-14: ci nus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1880E:99a-15: dang po sngags pa bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1880E:99a-17: rang gi snying gar zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:99a-18: tshe rabs sngon nas goms byas pa'i //
T02TD1880E:99a-19: tshad med bzhi bo snying rje dang //
T02TD1880E:99a-20: byang mas dang dga' dang btang snyoms te ;
T02TD1880E:99a-21: / tshangs spyod mtshan nyid bzhi rnams kyi //
T02TD1880E:99a-22: rgyu yi dngos po'i sa bon mam //
T02TD1880E:99a-23: dam pa'i gur gum lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:99a-25: 'gro rnams sdug pa bsngal mthong byas nas //
T02TD1880E:99a-27: bde bar 'dod rnams mthor byas nas //
T02TD1880E:99a-28: phan pa'i pa de ba ma lus pa //
T02TD1880E:99a-30: 'gro rnams spyod pa mi mnyam zhing //
T02TD1880E:99a-31: gdul dka' sdug bsngal lam la dga' //
T02TD1880E:99a-32: bde ba mi 'dod ba rnams kyi //
T02TD1880E:99a-33: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam pa dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-0: bde ba mtha' yas dang @99b ldan pa'i //
T02TD1880E:99b-1: ji ltar bdag gis bya bsams te //
T02TD1880E:99b-2: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i mam //
T02TD1880E:99b-3: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD1880E:99b-5: de nyid bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen //
T02TD1880E:99b-8: de lta de ltar 'gro ba la //
T02TD1880E:99b-9: thabs kun rab tu ston mdzad pas //
T02TD1880E:99b-10: thabs nyid gang gis sems can rnams //
T02TD1880E:99b-11: sdug bsngal kun las grol ba dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-12: bla med byang chub thob kyi bar //
T02TD1880E:99b-13: bde ba ma lus ldan 'grub pa //
T02TD1880E:99b-16: stobs dang ldan par bsams pa la //
T02TD1880E:99b-17: dga' ba'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'o //
T02TD1880E:99b-18: bsgoms pas byang chub nges byed phyir //
T02TD1880E:99b-19: 'jig rten bya ba mi byed pa'i //
T02TD1880E:99b-20: mtshan nyid btang snyoms chen po ste //
T02TD1880E:99b-21: de rnams nges par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1880E:99b-22: 'jam dpal nyid du bsgrub pa yang //
T02TD1880E:99b-23: bsod nams med par mi 'grub pas //
T02TD1880E:99b-24: sbyin pa la sogs 'grub pa'i rgyu //
T02TD1880E:99b-25: dbul phyir bdag gis mi nus pas //
T02TD1880E:99b-26: snying gar yid bzhin nor bu ltar /
T02TD1880E:99b-28: mam nyid rab tu dran byas te //
T02TD1880E:99b-29: de 'od las byung nam mkha' la //
T02TD1880E:99b-30: bla ma dam pa sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1880E:99b-31: sras dang bcas par gsal byas nas //
T02TD1880E:99b-32: de yi 'od zer las byung ba //
T02TD1880E:99b-33: spyan la stsogs pa'i lha mo bcus //
T02TD1880E:99b-34: dngos su gsang ba'i mchod pa dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-35: gzhan yang phyi yi mchod pa'i sprin //
T02TD1880E:99b-36: rin chen bdun dang mchod pa lnga //
T02TD1880E:99b-37: dri yi phye ma sna tshogs gos //
T02TD1880E:99b-38: sna tshogs rgyan dang phreng ba dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-39: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-40: rda yab sbrang yab bsil yab dang //
T02TD1880E:99b-41: rta dang glang po bud med chogs //
T02TD1880E:99b-42: seng+ge gdan dang bla re sogs //
T02TD1880E:99b-43: ji snyed brtan pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD1880E:99b-44: mchod pa byas nas phyag kyang bya //
T02TD1880E:99b-45: thog ma med pa'i srid rgyun man chad blo gros rnam rtog las byung ma lus tshang sdig gang //
T02TD1880E:99b-46: thugs rje cher ldan ma las mdun du cho ga de bzhin de rnams bdag gis bshags par bya //
T02TD1880E:99b-47: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de bzhin 'phags dang gzhan rnams kyis ni dge ba gan mdzad pa //
T02TD1880E:100a-1: med rjes su yi rang bla med byang chub chen por yang dag bdag gis bsngo //
T02TD1880E:100a-2: spro byed dri med thugs ni zla ba lta bus mtha' yas thugs rje dam pa'i thabs rnams la //
T02TD1880E:100a-3: bde bar gshegs pa kun la bdag nyis nang 'khor spyod bzhin rtag tu rab tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1880E:100a-4: rtog ba'i snyed ma lus grol ba lhag med dam pa'i sems can phun sum tshogs pa'i rten //
T02TD1880E:100a-5: ji snyed thams cad rog cig dngos po chos la bdag nyid kyis ni rab tu skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1880E:100a-6: yang dag bcings pa ma lus grol ba'i thugs mchog dang ldan kun gyi dpal nyid yang dag bstod //
T02TD1880E:100a-7: rab dga' la sogs sa bcur bzhugs rnams rab tu byung bdag tshogs la yang dag skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1880E:100a-8: bsam pa'i ngo bo rnam smin dag phyir sgrib pa'i bag chags thams cad yang dag shin tu bcom //
T02TD1880E:100a-9: yongs su grol ba'i sems ni rnam brgyan bla med byang chub la ni yang dag bskyed par bya //
T02TD1880E:100a-10: sras ldan bde ba gshegs dang lam gcig tu ni sbyin sogs yon tan dkar bo dngos po ste //
T02TD1880E:100a-11: ma lus yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rang bzhin blo yis da ltar bdag gis brten par bgyi //
T02TD1880E:100a-12: 'jig rten ma lus 'di rnams lta ba'i dra bas bcings pa la ni snying rje chen po bskyed //
T02TD1880E:100a-13: bla med byang chub sems ni dri med rin chen bdag gis yang dag gos pas yongs su bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:100a-14: rang bzhin dang bral stong ba nyid //
T02TD1880E:100a-15: rgyu med bas ni mtshan ma med //
T02TD1880E:100a-16: so sor rtog gi kun bral bas //
T02TD1880E:100a-17: ji snyed smon pa ma lus bral //
T02TD1880E:100a-18: de skad lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02TD1880E:100a-19: bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs byas nas //
T02TD1880E:100a-20: ye shes tshogs kyi don du ni //
T02TD1880E:100a-21: stong pa nyid ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:100a-22: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1880E:100a-23: sngags 'di bzlas pa byas nas su //
T02TD1880E:100a-24: 'gro ba kun gyi lus ngag yid //
T02TD1880E:100a-25: de rnams bdag gis ngo bo gcig //
T02TD1880E:100a-26: rang bzhin med phyir lus ngag yid ;
T02TD1880E:100a-27: / de rnams rang bzhin btags pa tsam //
T02TD1880E:100a-28: gang phyir brtags par rang 'dod de //
T02TD1880E:100a-29: de phyir rang bzhin lus ngag yid //
T02TD1880E:100a-30: aom a'a:h'um yig gsum byas la //
T02TD1880E:100a-31: ho: gnyis bar na rab gnas pa //
T02TD1880E:100a-32: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
T02TD1880E:100b-0: mdun gyi mkha' la bsam par bya @100b byang chub sgrub pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1880E:100b-1: bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bsal phyir //
T02TD1880E:100b-2: mdun du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1880E:100b-3: nag po h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:100b-6: mtshams kyi phyi rol dag na ni //
T02TD1880E:100b-7: bgegs rnams phur bus gdab par bya //
T02TD1880E:100b-8: phyogs dang mtshams su 'phros pa yis //
T02TD1880E:100b-9: rdo rje'i rab rab brtsigs te //
T02TD1880E:100b-10: steng du 'phros pas rdo rje gzeb //
T02TD1880E:100b-12: rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:100b-13: bcud dang bral ba'i sems kyis su //
T02TD1880E:100b-14: do yid bus su rdo rje sems //
T02TD1880E:100b-16: de las chos 'byung phyag rgyar dkar //
T02TD1880E:100b-17: grub nyid phra mo mar bltas nas //
T02TD1880E:100b-18: gyen du 'greng bar ba gnas pas //
T02TD1880E:100b-19: nang nyid nam mkha' lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:100b-20: dbus su ser po bam las byung //
T02TD1880E:100b-21: sna tshogs padma rnam bsams te //
T02TD1880E:100b-22: de steng kham ni ljang gu las //
T02TD1880E:100b-23: sna tshogs rdo rje bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:100b-24: de steng zla ba'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1880E:100b-25: dkar po brum las byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:100b-26: rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo'i lte ba la //
T02TD1880E:100b-27: brum gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsam //
T02TD1880E:100b-28: de las snang mdzad rig mar bcas //
T02TD1880E:100b-29: de las byung ba'i gzhal med khang //
T02TD1880E:100b-30: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1880E:100b-31: tvar na bzhis brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1880E:100b-32: ha ra ha ra phyed pas brgyan //
T02TD1880E:100b-33: sna tshogs padma bcu dgu'i steng //
T02TD1880E:100b-34: nyi ma'i gdan ni bdun rnams dang //
T02TD1880E:100b-35: zla ba bcu gnyis dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:100b-36: de lta bu ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD1880E:100b-37: de yi dbus kyi zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:100b-38: yi ge gsum la gnas pa'i sems //
T02TD1880E:100b-39: rab tu goms par bsam byas te //
T02TD1880E:100b-40: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i //
T02TD1880E:100b-41: bde gshegs 'gro ba ma lus rnams //
T02TD1880E:100b-42: byang chub rgyu la nges byed pas //
T02TD1880E:100b-43: de yi dus su gzigs par bya //
T02TD1880E:100b-44: de rnams mngon dga' sgrub rten du //
T02TD1880E:100b-45: thabs dang shes rang rang bzhin gyis //
T02TD1880E:100b-46: sgra yig bcu drug nyis 'gyur dang //
T02TD1880E:100b-47: gnas kyi yi ge sum cu bzhi //
T02TD1880E:100b-49: bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur du byas pa'i //
T02TD1880E:100b-50: yi ge brgyad cu gzugs su 'gyur //
T02TD1880E:100b-51: de nas gzhal med khang pa yi //
T02TD1880E:100b-52: steng gi mkha' la 'byor gyur nas //
T02TD1880E:100b-53: de rnams ye shes kyis bskul te //
T02TD1880E:101a-2: de nas nang gi zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:101a-3: yi ge phreng ba rim pa gnyis //
T02TD1880E:101a-4: 'og dang steng du gnas pa las //
T02TD1880E:101a-5: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1880E:101a-6: smon dang 'jug pa'i sems dang ni /
T02TD1880E:101a-7: mtshan dang dpe byad rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1880E:101a-8: zla ba gnyis su 'grub par bya //
T02TD1880E:101a-9: de gnyis dri med 'od gsal phyir //
T02TD1880E:101a-10: me long ye shes mngon gyur pa'o //
T02TD1880E:101a-11: de gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni //
T02TD1880E:101a-12: mnyam nyid gcig tu mthong ba'o //
T02TD1880E:101a-13: de las dkar po h'um du gyur //
T02TD1880E:101a-14: de las rdo rje dmar bo nyid //
T02TD1880E:101a-15: h'um gis mtshan pa bsam bya ste //
T02TD1880E:101a-16: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes /
T02TD1880E:101a-17: bdag la de yid nga rgyal bya //
T02TD1880E:101a-18: de nyid ku rtog ye shes so //
T02TD1880E:101a-19: de nas h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:101a-20: bde gshegs rnams kyis ji snyed pa'i //
T02TD1880E:101a-21: 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid byas nas //
T02TD1880E:101a-22: h'um gi nang du thim byas te //
T02TD1880E:101a-23: aom ya tha srab ta th'a ga ta a'a tam zhes //
T02TD1880E:101a-24: bdag la de yid rgyal bya //
T02TD1880E:101a-25: nan tan ye shes mthong ba'o //
T02TD1880E:101a-26: h'um gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas //
T02TD1880E:101a-27: mam mkhar gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1880E:101a-28: / h'um nyid la ni thim par bya //
T02TD1880E:101a-29: de gnyis zhu par gyur pa las //
T02TD1880E:101a-30: dbus zhal sku ni chu shel mdog //
T02TD1880E:101a-31: g-yas dang g-yas min gnag dang dmar //
T02TD1880E:101a-32: dbu brgyan mi bskyod pas gnon pa ;
T02TD1880E:101a-33: / rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas shing //
T02TD1880E:101a-34: zla ba'i gdan dang rgyab rten ldan //
T02TD1880E:101a-35: rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD1880E:101a-37: g-yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri gnyis bdag 'od rig ma 'khyud //
T02TD1880E:101a-38: g-yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD1880E:101a-39: rdo rje mas dba' rab tu bsgom //
T02TD1880E:101a-40: de nyid shin tu rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1880E:101a-41: chos dbyings ye shes rab rdzogs ba'o //
T02TD1880E:101a-42: de nas 'dod chags chen po yes yis //
T02TD1880E:101a-44: bde ba'i sgra yis rgyal ba'i tshogs //
T02TD1880E:101a-45: bskul nas byon par gyur pa rnam //
T02TD1880E:101a-46: ba spu'i bu gar thim gyur nas //
T02TD1880E:101a-47: mi snang bar ni rgyas gyur te //
T02TD1880E:101a-48: rang gi rig ma dga' bar bya //
T02TD1880E:101a-49: de nas then pa'i rgyal ba'i tshogs //
T02TD1880E:101a-50: rang rang rigs dang yongs 'brel ba'i //
T02TD1880E:101a-51: spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs //
T02TD1880E:101a-52: rig gi rdo rje ma yi bar //
T02TD1880E:101a-53: rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas //
T02TD1880E:101a-54: spros te yum gyi ba spu yi //
T02TD1880E:101b-0: bu gar thim pas @101b thabs nyid mnyes //
T02TD1880E:101b-1: de nas ye shes sems dpa'i yi //
T02TD1880E:101b-2: sa bon 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1880E:101b-3: bkug nas zhal du lam zhugs na //
T02TD1880E:101b-4: sku la thim nas zhu byas te //
T02TD1880E:101b-5: rdo rjer lam byung padmar gnas //
T02TD1880E:101b-6: de las rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1880E:101b-7: gtsor byas lha ni bcu dgu yi //
T02TD1880E:101b-9: de nang blo yis sems can rnams //
T02TD1880E:101b-10: sgo bzhi'i lam nas zhugs par bsam //
T02TD1880E:101b-11: de nas ye shes sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1880E:101b-12: 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug nas //
T02TD1880E:101b-13: zhal gyis lam zhugs zhu byas te //
T02TD1880E:101b-14: rdo rjer lam byung dbang yang bskur /
T02TD1880E:101b-15: de yi mthu yis sems can rnams //
T02TD1880E:101b-16: bde dang yid bde thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1880E:101b-17: ji ltar rim par dbye ba yi //
T02TD1880E:101b-18: mig dang rna ba sna dang ni //
T02TD1880E:101b-19: lce dang lus dang yid dag dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-20: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos //
T02TD1880E:101b-21: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /
T02TD1880E:101b-22: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /
T02TD1880E:101b-23: 'du byed rnam shes rnam dag pas //
T02TD1880E:101b-24: de las ksham dzrom kham gam shkam sam /
T02TD1880E:101b-26: kham ram lam m'am pam t'am /
T02TD1880E:101b-27: br'um a'am dzim kham h'um zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams su gyur //
T02TD1880E:101b-28: de las 'khor lo rdo rje dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-29: rin po che dang padma dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-30: ral gri dang ni rdo rje dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-31: me long bi wang dri yi cang //
T02TD1880E:101b-32: ro yi snod dang sna tshogs gos //
T02TD1880E:101b-33: chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-37: ral gri rdo rje phyag mtshan rnams //
T02TD1880E:101b-38: rang rang sa bon mtshan par gnas //
T02TD1880E:101b-39: sa bon phyag mtshan de nyid las //
T02TD1880E:101b-40: sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-41: nam snying 'jig rten dbang phyug dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-42: sgrib pa rnam sel kun du bzang //
T02TD1880E:101b-43: gzugs sgra dri ro rig dang ni //
T02TD1880E:101b-44: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rji dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-45: spyan yang ma dang m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1880E:101b-46: gos dmar mo dang sgo la ma dang //
T02TD1880E:101b-47: rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1880E:101b-48: snang mtha' yas dang don yod grub //
T02TD1880E:101b-49: mi bskyod pa rnams rab tu grub //
T02TD1880E:101b-50: de nas padma'i gzhal yas nas /
T02TD1880E:101b-51: blo yis phyi rol dbyung byas te //
T02TD1880E:101b-52: de rnams phan par shes nas su //
T02TD1880E:101b-53: bcom ldan phyag 'tshal bstod byas nas //
T02TD1880E:101b-54: bcom ldan sems can don du ni //
T02TD1880E:101b-55: mkha' la phyags bcur spros par bsam //
T02TD1880E:102a-2: rang gi zhal gyi lam du ni //
T02TD1880E:102a-3: yi ge gsum nyis gzhug byas te //
T02TD1880E:102a-4: zhugs nas rdo rje'i lam nas su //
T02TD1880E:102a-5: padmo dbus su babs par bya //
T02TD1880E:102a-7: rigs pas yab yum gnyi ga yang //
T02TD1880E:102a-8: 'dod chags chen po'i me yis ni //
T02TD1880E:102a-9: yongs su zhu bar gyur par bsam //
T02TD1880E:102a-10: de nas khu ba de nyid las //
T02TD1880E:102a-11: m'a ma k'i dbyung byas nas //
T02TD1880E:102a-12: lho nub mtshams kyi grvar bzhag ste //
T02TD1880E:102a-13: dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsgom byas te //
T02TD1880E:102a-14: rdo rje thugs khyod sems can dbyings kyi khams kyi dang nga phyug ste //
T02TD1880E:102a-15: dga' ba'i rnam pa yid 'ong mkhyen pa bsag la thar par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1880E:102a-16: sems can skyed byed gnyen mchog 'dod pa'i don chen rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1880E:102a-17: mgon po bdag ni gson par mches bzhes dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1880E:102a-19: khu ba nyid la thim par bya //
T02TD1880E:102a-20: rim bzhin lha mo gsum po yang //
T02TD1880E:102a-21: khu ba nyid las phyung nas ni //
T02TD1880E:102a-22: me dang rlung dang dbang ldan grvar //
T02TD1880E:102a-23: gnas nas bskul bar byed par bsam //
T02TD1880E:102a-24: rdo rje sku khyos sems can kun gyis dga' bar mkhyen pa po //
T02TD1880E:102a-25: sang rgyas 'khor lo don du don dam byang chub bstan pa can //
T02TD1880E:102a-26: mgon po chen po bdag nyid legs par gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1880E:102a-27: 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags dam tshig dam tshig bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1880E:102a-28: rdo rje gsung khyod thams cad kyis ni thugs rje dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:102a-29: 'jig rten don gyi dgos pa'i don kun dam pa'i spyod pa can //
T02TD1880E:102a-30: / mgon po chen po bdag po chen po bdag nyid gal te gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1880E:102a-31: kun du bzang po bde bar spyod pa bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1880E:102a-32: rdo rje 'dod pa khyed ni dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02TD1880E:102a-33: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung dngos mnyam pa'i thugs rje can //
T02TD1880E:102a-34: mgon po chen po bdag nyid gal te gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1880E:102a-35: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter bzhin bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02TD1880E:102a-36: rim bzhin dbyangs kyis bskul ma thag //
T02TD1880E:102a-37: rim pa bzhin du thim par byas //
T02TD1880E:102a-38: lha mos bskul ba'i dbang gis su //
T02TD1880E:102a-39: byang chub sems byung sa bon mam //
T02TD1880E:102b-0: gur @102b gum mdog 'drar rnam bsams te //
T02TD1880E:102b-1: de las ral gri'i yu ba la //
T02TD1880E:102b-2: zla ba'i steng du mam gyis mtshan //
T02TD1880E:102b-3: de yi 'od kyi mkha' dbyings na //
T02TD1880E:102b-4: gnas pa'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams //
T02TD1880E:102b-5: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i skur byas te //
T02TD1880E:102b-6: bkug nas mam la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:102b-7: de gnyis zhu bar gyur pa las //
T02TD1880E:102b-8: dbus zhal sku ni gur gum mdog //
T02TD1880E:102b-9: g-yas dang g-yas min gnag dkar //
T02TD1880E:102b-11: g-yas gnyis ral gri mda' 'dzin pa //
T02TD1880E:102b-12: g-yon gnyis gzhu dan autpala sdo //
T02TD1880E:102b-13: rin chen dbu rgyan dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:102b-14: rdo rje skyil krung shin tu brten //
T02TD1880E:102b-15: rgyan rnams so sor brgyan byas pa'i //
T02TD1880E:102b-16: 'jam dbyangs dpal dang ldan pa bsam //
T02TD1880E:102b-17: aom dharma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1880E:102b-18: chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1880E:102b-19: gnyen po'i bsnyen pa'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:102b-21: de nas rang gi mig gnyis kyi //
T02TD1880E:102b-22: dbus su zla bar re re la //
T02TD1880E:102b-23: kshi kar po las byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:102b-24: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyud pa'i //
T02TD1880E:102b-25: lte bar kshi yis mtshan pa bsam //
T02TD1880E:102b-26: de las sa snying po nyid //
T02TD1880E:102b-27: g-yas gnag g-yon ni dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1880E:102b-30: rna ba'i bu ga gnyis po la //
T02TD1880E:102b-31: zla ba'i dbus su nag po dzrim //
T02TD1880E:102b-32: de las rdo rje dzrim gis mtshan //
T02TD1880E:102b-33: de las phyag na rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1880E:102b-34: g-yas dang g-yon dkar dmar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1880E:102b-35: g-yas gnyis rdo rje la gri 'dzin //
T02TD1880E:102b-36: g-yon gnyis nor bu padma ldan //
T02TD1880E:102b-37: sna yi bu ga gnyis po la //
T02TD1880E:102b-38: zla ba'i dbus su kham ser po ;
T02TD1880E:102b-39: / de las rin chen ljang gu ni //
T02TD1880E:102b-40: kham gis mtshan pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD1880E:102b-41: nam mkha'i snying po bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:102b-42: g-yas sngo g-yon ni dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1880E:102b-43: g-yas gnyis gyas gnyis nor bu ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1880E:102b-45: lhe dbus zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1880E:102b-46: dmar po gam las byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:102b-47: padma gam gis mtshan pa bsam /
T02TD1880E:102b-48: de las 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid //
T02TD1880E:102b-49: g-yas gnag g-yon ni dkar ba'i zhal //
T02TD1880E:102b-52: dpral ba'i dbus su zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:103a-2: 'khyud pa rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyar ba byas la bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1880E:103a-3: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das ni snyoms par zhugs pa ma yin ni zhes 'dod pa bsal ba yin no //
T02TD1880E:103a-4: da ni rim pa gang gis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhe sdang gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i rjes su dran ba'i bsgom pa gsungs pa //
T02TD1880E:103a-5: zhe sdang rjes dran zhes bya ba la sogs ba la zhe sdang ni zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs so //
T02TD1880E:103a-6: 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gshin rje gshed nag po'i gzugs kyi rjes su ste phyi nas so //
T02TD1880E:103a-7: dran pa ni rjes su dran pa ste zhe sdang rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103a-8: rnal 'byor ni shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103a-9: de yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las //
T02TD1880E:103a-10: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas //
T02TD1880E:103a-11: snal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1880E:103a-13: de gang la yod pa de ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro //
T02TD1880E:103a-14: 'dis ni bdag nyid de kho na'i bdag nyid can no zhes bstan to //
T02TD1880E:103a-15: gti mug ni gti mug gshin rje gshed do //
T02TD1880E:103a-16: zhes dang gi rjes la ste phyi nas so //
T02TD1880E:103a-17: dran pa ni rjes su dran pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103a-18: phar ma zhes bya ba la phra ma ni gti mug gi rjes la ste snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1880E:103a-19: 'dod chags ni phra ma'i rjes la snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1880E:103a-20: de'i rjes la ni phrag dogs te /
T02TD1880E:103a-21: phrag dog ni gshin rje ka shed do //
T02TD1880E:103a-22: dran pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par blta bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1880E:103a-23: brtul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig bsrung ba gang la yod pa de ni brtul zhugs can no //
T02TD1880E:103a-24: da ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs nas spro ba gsungs pa /
T02TD1880E:103a-25: ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya //
T02TD1880E:103a-26: zhes bya ba la spo ba ni ston la //
T02TD1880E:103a-27: dam tshig gi 'khor lor dgod par bya'i zhes bya ba'i can no //
T02TD1880E:103a-28: da ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs nas spro ba gsungs khung nas so //
T02TD1880E:103a-29: rigs kyi zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi rgyur gyur pa zhes sdang la sogs pa'i rigs so //
T02TD1880E:103a-30: de nyid kyi sprin rnams ni mtha' med pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs nyid kyis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103a-31: so so zhes bya ba re re las kyang ngo //
T02TD1880E:103a-32: spro bhar bya zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin sbyar ro //
T02TD1880E:103b-1: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-2: rjes su dran pa bsgom pa gang bstan pa de ni rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i rim par phye ba'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-3: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dka' 'grel slob dpon shr'i dha ras mdzad pa las rim par pheb bcu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD1880E:103b-5: // da ni rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma thob pas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi ngo bo spyod pa bya'o zhes bya bas de'i phyir zhe sdang la sogs pa rnam par dag pas brtse ba sngon du 'gro ba bstan pas spyod pa'i rim par phye ba gsungs pa /
T02TD1880E:103b-6: zhes dang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1880E:103b-7: zhe sdang ni phan tshun mi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-8: des mnan pa ni shin tu khyab pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-9: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-10: mthong nas zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su mdzad do zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD1880E:103b-11: khyad par ji lta bu can zhig ce na /
T02TD1880E:103b-13: zhes sdang thams cad zad par byed //
T02TD1880E:103b-14: ces bya ba ste zhe sdang thams cad ni sems can thams cad kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1880E:103b-15: de'i zad pa ni dngos po med par byed pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-17: zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed //
T02TD1880E:103b-19: 'dis ni 'di ltar bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1880E:103b-20: 'di'i ngo bo mngon par rtogs par gyur pa na de zad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1880E:103b-21: gal te bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa yin na ji ltar gzugs 'di lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1880E:103b-22: de'i phyir gsungs pa snying rje'i dbang gis zhes bya ba ste snying rje'i gzhan dbang du gyur pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1880E:103b-23: de bzhin du gti mug gis man zhes bya ba la sogs par yang go bar bya'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-24: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1880E:103b-25: byams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1880E:103b-26: byams pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba ster ba'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-27: der ni tsa rtsi ka zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1880E:103b-28: snying rje ni sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la zhugs pa las 'byin par 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1880E:103b-29: dga' ba ni sems can rnam ngo bo nyid med par rtogs nas de dag la 'di yod do zhes bya bas dka' ba med par rtogs par bus so zhes dga' ba'i sems so //
T02TD1880E:103b-30: bstan snyoms ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba dang /
T02TD1880E:104a-1: / dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra ba yid //
T02TD1880E:104a-2: ye shes sems dpa' gnas dang bcas //
T02TD1880E:104a-3: de yi thugs kar zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:104a-4: mam las ral gri'i yu ba la'ang //
T02TD1880E:104a-5: zla ba'i steng du mam bsams te //
T02TD1880E:104a-6: de yi 'od zer gyis bskul nas //
T02TD1880E:104a-7: nam mkhar gnas pa'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1880E:104a-8: so sor 'od zer las byung ba'i //
T02TD1880E:104a-9: spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis //
T02TD1880E:104a-10: bum pa'i ye shes chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD1880E:104a-11: dri ma med byas dbang bskur zhes //
T02TD1880E:104a-12: chu dang lha mo skur thim ste //
T02TD1880E:104a-13: mi bskyod dbu rgyan rab tu grub pa chen po ye //
T02TD1880E:104a-15: de nas mdun du zla ba bsam //
T02TD1880E:104a-16: yi ge gsum la gnas byed pa'i //
T02TD1880E:104a-17: rnal 'byor pa yi sems nyid ni //
T02TD1880E:104a-18: bag chags dngos po gang yin de //
T02TD1880E:104a-19: zla ba'i dbus su gnas byas la //
T02TD1880E:104a-20: sngon bzhin 'gro ba'i byang chub rgyur //
T02TD1880E:104a-21: 'thad pa'i bde gshegs ma lus kyis //
T02TD1880E:104a-22: zla ba'i gnyis pa grub la sogs //
T02TD1880E:104a-23: mngon par byang chub rnam pa ldas //
T02TD1880E:104a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom //
T02TD1880E:104a-25: gnyi ga'i dga' ba dag dang ni //
T02TD1880E:104a-26: 'gro ba dbang bskur ma byas par //
T02TD1880E:104a-27: snga ma bzhin du yig ge gsum /
T02TD1880E:104a-28: zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas ba //
T02TD1880E:104a-29: zhu na rdo rje'i lam nas su //
T02TD1880E:104a-30: phyung nas padma'i nang du gnas //
T02TD1880E:104a-32: 'od rigs bcas par zhu bar gyur //
T02TD1880E:104a-33: lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul pa las //
T02TD1880E:104a-34: khu ba las byung mam gyi mdog / gur gum lta bu las byung pa'i //
T02TD1880E:104a-35: ral gri'i yu bar zla ba 'ang //
T02TD1880E:104a-36: mam gyis mtshan pa bsam byas te ;
T02TD1880E:104a-37: / de yi 'od kyis mkha' dbyings na //
T02TD1880E:104a-38: gnas pa'i bde gshegs ji snyed rnams //
T02TD1880E:104a-39: 'jam pa'i rdo rje mar byas te //
T02TD1880E:104a-40: bkug nas de la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:104a-41: mam dang ral gri de gyur pas //
T02TD1880E:104a-42: 'jam pa'i rdo rje lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:104a-43: 'jam dbyangs ma ni bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD1880E:104a-45: aom dharma dh'a tu sv'a bh'a war a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1880E:104a-46: zhes bdag nyid nga bskyed par bya //
T02TD1880E:104a-47: bar gyi bsnyen ba'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:104a-49: de nas sngon du bstan pa bzhin //
T02TD1880E:104a-50: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab /
T02TD1880E:104b-0: bar gyi nye ba'i @104b bsgrub pa dang //
T02TD1880E:104b-2: sngon bzhin thugs sogs rdo rje rnams //
T02TD1880E:104b-3: grub par 'gyur bar rab bsgoms te /
T02TD1880E:104b-4: sngar gyis byin gyis brlabs pa tsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-5: bar gyi grub pa'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:104b-7: de nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje yi ;
T02TD1880E:104b-8: / ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:104b-9: 'od kyis bde gshegs ma lus rnams //
T02TD1880E:104b-10: bskul pa'i 'od zer las byung ba'i //
T02TD1880E:104b-11: spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur nas //
T02TD1880E:104b-12: mi bskyod dbu rgyan ldan par bya //
T02TD1880E:104b-13: bar gyi sgrub pa chen po dang //
T02TD1880E:104b-15: de nas skra yi lam nang gi //
T02TD1880E:104b-16: zla ba'i dbus su aom dkar po //
T02TD1880E:104b-17: sku yi rigs kyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1880E:104b-18: de yis aom ni phra mo yis //
T02TD1880E:104b-19: nu ma yan lag khyab bar bsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-20: snying gar nyi ma steng du ni //
T02TD1880E:104b-21: nag po h'um ni bsam bya ba //
T02TD1880E:104b-22: thugs kyi rigs kyi rang bzhin te //
T02TD1880E:104b-23: de yi h'um ni phra mo yis //
T02TD1880E:104b-24: lte ba yan chad khyab par bsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-25: lte ba'i 'og tu nyi ma la //
T02TD1880E:104b-26: sv'a nyi ser po rin chen rigs //
T02TD1880E:104b-27: de yi sv'a ni phra mo yis //
T02TD1880E:104b-28: rked pa yan chad khyab par bsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-29: gsang ba'i dbus su nyi ma la //
T02TD1880E:104b-34: rked pa ma lus khyab par bsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-35: brla gnyis dbus nas nyid ma la //
T02TD1880E:104b-36: h'a nyid lhang gu las kyi rigs //
T02TD1880E:104b-37: de yi h'a ni phra mo rnams //
T02TD1880E:104b-38: rkang mthil yan chad khyab par bsam //
T02TD1880E:104b-39: rigs snga'i tshogs dang ldan byas te //
T02TD1880E:104b-40: h'um gis rang gi rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1880E:104b-41: bum par byas pa bsam byas nas ;
T02TD1880E:104b-42: / yom gyis bu ga grub par bya //
T02TD1880E:104b-43: de yi nang du phyag ser po //
T02TD1880E:104b-44: rang gi rig ma'i padma la //
T02TD1880E:104b-45: na po h'um nyid phra mo yis //
T02TD1880E:104b-46: khyab par rab tu bsam byas nas //
T02TD1880E:104b-47: a'a: yis snying po 'grub bya zhing //
T02TD1880E:104b-48: bu gar phat kyang bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:104b-49: gnas skabs lnga dang gyur pa yid //
T02TD1880E:104b-50: shes rab ma nyid grub byas la //
T02TD1880E:104b-51: rang gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas //
T02TD1880E:104b-52: rang gi rig ma nyid la thim //
T02TD1880E:104b-53: aom rbab ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1880E:104b-54: zhes sngags nyid rab tu bzlas par bya //
T02TD1880E:104b-55: dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02TD1880E:105a-0: // / de nas @105a rang gis bon gyi /
T02TD1880E:105a-1: 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug ste /
T02TD1880E:105a-5: de las gyur pa'i sa bon mam //
T02TD1880E:105a-6: de las gtso bo mi bskyon pa //
T02TD1880E:105a-7: 'khor lor bcas pa bskor byas te //
T02TD1880E:105a-8: 'phro ba'i sngags kyis rim bzhin spro //
T02TD1880E:105a-10: phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi /
T02TD1880E:105a-11: mi bskyod pa ni 'phro byas te //
T02TD1880E:105a-12: sangs rgyas bya ba kun mdzad nas //
T02TD1880E:105a-13: 'dus nas bdag la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:105a-14: dzin dzik ka zhes pas su /
T02TD1880E:105a-15: sa yi snying po lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-16: gong ma lta bu rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1880E:105a-18: shar gyis zla bar gnas par bsam //
T02TD1880E:105a-20: nam mkha'i snying po 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-22: lho yi nyi mar gnas par bsam //
T02TD1880E:105a-23: a'a ro lik zhes pas su //
T02TD1880E:105a-26: nub kyi nyi mar gnas par bya //
T02TD1880E:105a-28: sgrib pa rnam sel 'gro ba yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-29: don yod grub par 'phro byas nas //
T02TD1880E:105a-30: byang gi nyi mar gnas par bsam //
T02TD1880E:105a-31: kun kyang ral pa'i dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1880E:105a-32: gsum po nyi ma'i 'od dang ni //
T02TD1880E:105a-35: mo lha ra t'i zhes pas su //
T02TD1880E:105a-36: sa yi snying po lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-37: spyan ma shar lho mtshams su bsam //
T02TD1880E:105a-38: dve shad rt'i zhas pas su //
T02TD1880E:105a-39: phyag na rdo rje lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-40: m'a ma k'i ni lho nub mtshams //
T02TD1880E:105a-41: r'a gar t'i zhes pas su //
T02TD1880E:105a-43: gos dkar mo ni nub byang mtshams //
T02TD1880E:105a-44: badzra ra t'i zhes bya bas //
T02TD1880E:105a-45: nam mkha'i snying po 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1880E:105a-47: sgrol ma byang shar mtshams su bsam //
T02TD1880E:105a-48: de rnams rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD1880E:105a-50: autpala ser por shes par bya //
T02TD1880E:105a-51: 'khor lo phyi rol grva bzhi sang //
T02TD1880E:105a-52: shar gyi g-yon phyogs gnyis la //
T02TD1880E:105a-53: de nyid gsum gyi gong ma ltar //
T02TD1880E:105a-54: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dang //
T02TD1880E:105a-55: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma //
T02TD1880E:105a-56: sa nying la sogs 'dra ba rnams //
T02TD1880E:105a-57: me long pe wang dri yi dung //
T02TD1880E:105b-0: ro yi snod @105b dang sna tshogs gos //
T02TD1880E:105b-1: chos kyi 'byung gnas phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD1880E:105b-2: rim bzhin rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ldan //
T02TD1880E:105b-3: yamanta kri ta ces pas su //
T02TD1880E:105b-4: mi bskyod lta bu'i gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1880E:105b-5: gong ma lta bu shar sgor bsam //
T02TD1880E:105b-6: pradzny'anta kri ta ces pas su //
T02TD1880E:105b-7: rnam par snang mdzad lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-8: shes rab mthar nyi ma'i gdan //
T02TD1880E:105b-10: bye brag byas pa lho sgor bsam //
T02TD1880E:105b-11: padmanta kri ta ces pas su //
T02TD1880E:105b-12: 'dod dpag med pa lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-13: padma mthar byed nub sgor bsam //
T02TD1880E:105b-15: gshin rje mthar 'byin lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-16: bgegs mthar 'byin pa byang gi sgor //
T02TD1880E:105b-17: de rnam rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan ni //
T02TD1880E:105b-19: padma rdo rje kha dbye ba'o //
T02TD1880E:105b-20: kun kyang g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs //
T02TD1880E:105b-21: zhal ni dgod dang gdangs pa dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-22: khro dang mche ba gtsigs par ldan //
T02TD1880E:105b-24: / nyi ma gsar shar lta bu dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-25: zhal ni khro gnyer dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:105b-26: gsus pa che zhing yangs pa dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-27: sra zhing phye ba 'phyang bar ldan //
T02TD1880E:105b-28: brla dang brang yang de bzhin te //
T02TD1880E:105b-29: lus dang yan lag thams cad kun //
T02TD1880E:105b-30: thung zhing rab tu sbom pa dang /
T02TD1880E:105b-31: sma dmar ser bod dang ldan //
T02TD1880E:105b-32: skra yang dmar ser 'od dang ldan //
T02TD1880E:105b-36: dang po phyag gis khyad pa dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-37: stag spags smad g-yogs dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:105b-38: bung ba nag po lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-39: mtha' yas dbu yi thong du bcings //
T02TD1880E:105b-40: mdog dmar drag po lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-41: 'jog po yi ni snyan cha dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-42: padma chen po dkar po yis //
T02TD1880E:105b-43: do shal rgyan ni byas pa ste //
T02TD1880E:105b-44: stobs rgyu ljang gu ser la kha //
T02TD1880E:105b-45: dung skyong ser pos phyag gsub byas //
T02TD1880E:105b-46: kha dog sna tshogs lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-47: rigs ldan gyi ni dpung rgyan dang //
T02TD1880E:105b-48: nor rgyas mdos dkar ska rags byas //
T02TD1880E:105b-49: padma'i rtsa ba lta bu yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-50: padmas rkang gdub byas pa yi //
T02TD1880E:105b-51: de rnams rab tu bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:105b-52: de nas rang gi sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:105b-54: khro bo bzhi yi thugs bskul nas //
T02TD1880E:106a-2: de yi thugs las 'phros pa yi //
T02TD1880E:106a-3: khro bo rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1880E:106a-4: bgegs rnams med par bsrung byas te //
T02TD1880E:106a-5: lcags kyus dgug par byas nas su //
T02TD1880E:106a-6: rdo rjer ba bshig byas te //
T02TD1880E:106a-7: zhugs te rang gi mdun du ni //
T02TD1880E:106a-8: sna tshogs padmar gnas par bsam //
T02TD1880E:106a-9: de nas snying nas 'phros pa yi //
T02TD1880E:106a-10: khro bo rnams kyi ra ba nyid //
T02TD1880E:106a-11: bshig pa brtsigs par byas nas su //
T02TD1880E:106a-12: phyir yang snying la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-13: de nas rang gi mdun du ni //
T02TD1880E:106a-14: man ji gsum la dung phyir gsum //
T02TD1880E:106a-15: me tog dkar po dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:106a-16: tsandan chu yis gang bar byas //
T02TD1880E:106a-17: de mdun man ji gnyis steng du //
T02TD1880E:106a-18: gser dang rin chen las byas ba'i //
T02TD1880E:106a-19: gsol ba'i snod gnyis gzhag par bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-20: g-yas phyogs dung gi gsum pa la //
T02TD1880E:106a-22: bying brlabs bdud rtsi lnga blugs bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-23: yi ge gsum gyi bar byas te //
T02TD1880E:106a-24: yi dam lha yi sngags bzlas la //
T02TD1880E:106a-25: ku sha'i bam po dang po yi //
T02TD1880E:106a-26: dung gi chu yis gsol ba'i snod //
T02TD1880E:106a-27: dang po lan gsum ba tung gtor bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-30: bzung ste de yi snod nyid la //
T02TD1880E:106a-31: lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-32: gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas //
T02TD1880E:106a-33: gnyis pa mchod yon chu yang sbyin //
T02TD1880E:106a-34: de nas me tog bzung byas te //
T02TD1880E:106a-35: zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan par //
T02TD1880E:106a-36: de yi snod la zhabs bsil sbyin //
T02TD1880E:106a-37: de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1880E:106a-38: shes rab mthar byed bskul byas nas //
T02TD1880E:106a-39: de yis h'um brjod snying las su //
T02TD1880E:106a-40: byung ba'i 'od zer dkar po yis //
T02TD1880E:106a-41: ye shes dkyil 'khor bteg byas nas //
T02TD1880E:106a-42: rang gi dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:106a-43: de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1880E:106a-44: padma mthar byed bskul byas nas //
T02TD1880E:106a-45: de yis bam brjod thugs las su //
T02TD1880E:106a-47: dkyil 'khor khyab par byas nas bcing //
T02TD1880E:106a-48: de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1880E:106a-49: bgegs mthar phyin pa bskul byas nas //
T02TD1880E:106a-50: de yis ho:brjod de snying las //
T02TD1880E:106a-52: khyab par rab tu dga' bar bsam //
T02TD1880E:106b-0: yang dag bsnyen @106b pa'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-2: kun gyi mig la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1880E:106b-3: sa yi snying po la sogs par //
T02TD1880E:106b-4: rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1880E:106b-5: yang dag sgrub pa'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-7: de rnams kun la gnas gsum du //
T02TD1880E:106b-8: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1880E:106b-9: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te //
T02TD1880E:106b-10: rdzogs pa'i tshul du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1880E:106b-11: yang dag bsgrub pa yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-13: rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1880E:106b-14: bskul nas nam mkhar gnas pa yi /
T02TD1880E:106b-15: bde gshegs rnams kyi 'od zer las //
T02TD1880E:106b-16: spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyi //
T02TD1880E:106b-17: dbang bskur byas nas dbu rgyan la //
T02TD1880E:106b-18: rang rang bdag po grub bya ba //
T02TD1880E:106b-19: bde gshegs lnga dang m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1880E:106b-20: sgra dang chos dbyings rdo rje dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-21: shes rab mthar phyin bgegs mthar phyin //
T02TD1880E:106b-22: de rnams bdag po mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1880E:106b-23: spyan ma gzugs kyi rdo rje dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-24: gshin rje mthar phyin rnam snang mdzad //
T02TD1880E:106b-25: dri yi rdo rje rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1880E:106b-26: ro yi rdo rje gos dkar mo //
T02TD1880E:106b-28: sgrol ma reg gi rdo rje ma'i //
T02TD1880E:106b-29: dbu rgyan bdag po don yod grub //
T02TD1880E:106b-30: mi bskyod dbu rgyan rdo rje sems //
T02TD1880E:106b-31: sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag dang //
T02TD1880E:106b-33: de nas rang gi sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:106b-34: 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug ste //
T02TD1880E:106b-35: zhal du zhugs nas zhu byas la //
T02TD1880E:106b-37: khu bde las gyur ba yi //
T02TD1880E:106b-38: dza:h'um bam ho: kham ram zhes //
T02TD1880E:106b-39: dang po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa //
T02TD1880E:106b-40: de steng mam lam pam tam zhes //
T02TD1880E:106b-41: gzhan gyi steng du gnas par bya //
T02TD1880E:106b-42: rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1880E:106b-43: gzugs sogs rdo rje dgug byas la //
T02TD1880E:106b-44: rang rang sa bon la ni thim //
T02TD1880E:106b-45: de yi sa bon rgyas par 'gyur //
T02TD1880E:106b-46: rig ma'i ba spu'i bu ga nas //
T02TD1880E:106b-48: dkyil 'khor las ni mthong bar bya //
T02TD1880E:106b-49: de las byung ba'i spyan la sogs //
T02TD1880E:106b-51: rang rang rigs dang 'brel rnams kyi //
T02TD1880E:106b-52: rang gi 'khor lo rab tu mchod //
T02TD1880E:106b-53: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bta' wa a'atma ko& ham //
T02TD1880E:107a-0: @107a * // sngags kyang rab tu brjod par bya //
T02TD1880E:107a-1: de nas rab tu bstod par bya //
T02TD1880E:107a-2: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02TD1880E:107a-3: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02TD1880E:107a-4: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02TD1880E:107a-5: dbyangs kyi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1880E:107a-6: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
T02TD1880E:107a-7: rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che //
T02TD1880E:107a-8: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog //
T02TD1880E:107a-9: zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1880E:107a-10: rin chen rgyal po shin tu zab //
T02TD1880E:107a-11: rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med //
T02TD1880E:107a-12: rang bzhin dag bas gos pa med //
T02TD1880E:107a-13: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1880E:107a-14: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che //
T02TD1880E:107a-15: mi rtog nam mkha'i rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1880E:107a-16: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa thob //
T02TD1880E:107a-18: rdo rje don grub rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1880E:107a-19: bsam pa thams cad yongs su grub //
T02TD1880E:107a-20: rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung //
T02TD1880E:107a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod ;
T02TD1880E:107a-22: / de nas sa bon yam gi mdog //
T02TD1880E:107a-23: du ba lta bu las byung ba'i //
T02TD1880E:107a-24: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu //
T02TD1880E:107a-25: g-yas g-yon ba dan gyis mtshan pa //
T02TD1880E:107a-26: yam gis mtshan pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1880E:107a-27: de steng ram ni dmar po las //
T02TD1880E:107a-28: byung ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1880E:107a-29: grub gsum 'bar ba ram gyis mtshan //
T02TD1880E:107a-30: de steng aa dkar byung ba yi //
T02TD1880E:107a-31: padma'i snod ni aa yis mtshan //
T02TD1880E:107a-32: de nang dbus kyi phyogs dang ni //
T02TD1880E:107a-33: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi ru //
T02TD1880E:107a-34: rim bzhin dri chu dri chen dang //
T02TD1880E:107a-35: rkta dang ni byang chub sems //
T02TD1880E:107a-36: ma h'a mam sa gzhag par bya //
T02TD1880E:107a-37: de steng shar du zla ba dang //
T02TD1880E:107a-38: lhag ma bzhi ni nyi ma'i gdan //
T02TD1880E:107a-39: de steng h'um br'um a'am br'um a'am dzr'am kham //
T02TD1880E:107a-40: sa bon rnam lnga mthong byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107a-41: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:107a-42: 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bkug ste //
T02TD1880E:107a-43: rang rang sa bon nyid du thim //
T02TD1880E:107a-44: de nas rlung gis me bskyod nas //
T02TD1880E:107a-45: me yin thod ba btsos pa yi //
T02TD1880E:107a-46: rlangs pa las byung h'um gi tshogs //
T02TD1880E:107a-47: dkar po las byung rdo rje'i tshogs //
T02TD1880E:107a-48: bum pa h'um gis mtshan par bsam //
T02TD1880E:107a-49: de rnams phreng ba lta bu'i rgyun //
T02TD1880E:107a-50: zhu nas snod la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:107a-51: de bzhin lan gnyis gsum bzhi'i bar //
T02TD1880E:107b-0: bsams te rlung me la @107b sogs pa ;
T02TD1880E:107b-1: / de rnams ma lus gyur bar bsam //
T02TD1880E:107b-2: me tog padma dkar po nang //
T02TD1880E:107b-3: bdud rtsis gang bar gyur bar bsam //
T02TD1880E:107b-4: bsil bar bya phyir de steng du //
T02TD1880E:107b-5: dkar po aam ni bsam byas te //
T02TD1880E:107b-6: zhu nas nang du zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:107b-8: phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:107b-9: rang gi lce yi dkyil du yang //
T02TD1880E:107b-10: h'um las rdo rje rtse gsum pa //
T02TD1880E:107b-11: bum par h'um gis byin brlabs bsam //
T02TD1880E:107b-12: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sangs nyid //
T02TD1880E:107b-13: ji ltar 'dod pa bzlas byas te //
T02TD1880E:107b-14: bdud rtsis bkang ba'i padma la //
T02TD1880E:107b-15: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon las //
T02TD1880E:107b-16: 'od zer byung bas bskul byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-18: lha rnams so so'i phyag gnas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-19: yab yum dus gcig mthun pa ru //
T02TD1880E:107b-20: bdud rtsi'i ro mchog myong bar bsam //
T02TD1880E:107b-21: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02TD1880E:107b-24: // / de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:107b-25: sa bon las ni 'od zer tshogs //
T02TD1880E:107b-26: gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu //
T02TD1880E:107b-27: kha dog sna tshogs 'phros pa yi //
T02TD1880E:107b-28: rtse gsum bde gshegs byung rnams kyis //
T02TD1880E:107b-29: 'gro ba sangs rgyas bar byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-30: sa bon nyid la thim gyur te //
T02TD1880E:107b-31: de yis yang dag rgyas par gyur //
T02TD1880E:107b-32: 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab phyir //
T02TD1880E:107b-33: mam de nyid ni thig ler gyur //
T02TD1880E:107b-34: de yi 'od zer rim pa yis //
T02TD1880E:107b-35: dad po ral gri snang bar byas //
T02TD1880E:107b-36: de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:107b-37: nang du phyi dang lus dang ni //
T02TD1880E:107b-38: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnams /
T02TD1880E:107b-39: gnas pa'i ral gri dag dang ni //
T02TD1880E:107b-40: dam tshigs sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1880E:107b-41: rdo rje tshun chad snang byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-42: de nas rang sems yi ge mam //
T02TD1880E:107b-43: thig le lta bur zhugs bar bya //
T02TD1880E:107b-44: bskyed pa'i rim pa de ma thag / ting 'dzin gsum gyis yong su grub //
T02TD1880E:107b-45: 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-46: dam tshig sems dang 'brel ba yi //
T02TD1880E:107b-47: rdo rje thugs sogs yan chad gsal //
T02TD1880E:107b-48: gzhag pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1880E:107b-49: dam tshig sems dpa'i phyi yi sku //
T02TD1880E:107b-50: de yi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas //
T02TD1880E:107b-51: gzhal med khang nas phyi rol du //
T02TD1880E:108a-2: yang ni de bzhin bzhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-3: de lta'i rim pa rab 'phro zhing //
T02TD1880E:108a-6: las kyi rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02TD1880E:108a-9: // / thig le rnal 'byor bsdu byas nas //
T02TD1880E:108a-10: phra mo rnal 'byor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-11: ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:108a-12: 'od kyis bde gshegs rnams bskug nas //
T02TD1880E:108a-13: zhal gyi lam du zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1880E:108a-14: rdo rje'i lam nas padmar gnas //
T02TD1880E:108a-15: de nas las kyi tshad tsam gyi //
T02TD1880E:108a-16: ral gri yu bar gzhal med khang //
T02TD1880E:108a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02TD1880E:108a-18: padmo dbus na mthong bar bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-19: gnyi ga'i dga' ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1880E:108a-20: thig le rnal 'byor yan chad bar //
T02TD1880E:108a-21: ting 'dzin gsum nyid rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1880E:108a-22: rang gi rdo rje rtse lnga yi //
T02TD1880E:108a-23: rtse dbus lcags kyur lta bu ru //
T02TD1880E:108a-24: bsam ste de yi lcags kyu yis //
T02TD1880E:108a-25: dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1880E:108a-26: ldan ba'i ral gri mo nyid //
T02TD1880E:108a-27: phyi rol du ni phyung byas te //
T02TD1880E:108a-28: padma'i sna rtser gnas par bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-30: dam tshig sems dang 'brel ba yi //
T02TD1880E:108a-31: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje la //
T02TD1880E:108a-32: snang bar byas pa yan chad kyi //
T02TD1880E:108a-33: 'od kyis dam tshig sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:108a-34: phyi yi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1880E:108a-35: lha rnams rab tu gsal byas nas //
T02TD1880E:108a-36: gzhal med khang nas phyir byung ba'i //
T02TD1880E:108a-37: 'od kyis nam mkha' khyab byas te //
T02TD1880E:108a-38: phyir yang de nyid zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-39: de bzhin yang dang yang ni bsam //
T02TD1880E:108a-40: mtshan ma ma byung bar du ni //
T02TD1880E:108a-42: ji tsam 'dod pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1880E:108a-43: mtshan ma rnam pa lnga mthong nas //
T02TD1880E:108a-44: lha dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa //
T02TD1880E:108a-46: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02TD1880E:108a-48: // / phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsdus ma thag / sku yi rdo rje la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1880E:108a-49: thugs kyi zla ba la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1880E:108a-50: phyag mtshan dkyil na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1880E:108a-51: aom sogs bzlas pa'i dus su ni //
T02TD1880E:108a-52: sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang //
T02TD1880E:108a-53: lha mo bde gshegs bcas pa rnams //
T02TD1880E:108a-54: padma'i dkyil na gnas pa yi //
T02TD1880E:108b-0: lha @108b mo'i sa bon dzam la sogs //
T02TD1880E:108b-1: gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1880E:108b-2: mchod pa'i lha mor ldan pa rnams //
T02TD1880E:108b-3: rim par bye brag so so nas //
T02TD1880E:108b-4: bzlas ma thag tu 'phro byas te //
T02TD1880E:108b-5: bzlas pa zin pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD1880E:108b-6: rang rang sa bon zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:108b-7: 'di ltar rim pa'i bzlas brjod rdzogs //
T02TD1880E:108b-8: rdzogs pa'i bzlas brjod phyogs su ni //
T02TD1880E:108b-9: re re brjod pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD1880E:108b-10: rang rang sa bon rnams las ni //
T02TD1880E:108b-11: sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang //
T02TD1880E:108b-12: lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02TD1880E:108b-13: aom la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams //
T02TD1880E:108b-14: bzlas pa zin pa'i skad cig la //
T02TD1880E:108b-15: rang rang sa bon rnams la ni //
T02TD1880E:108b-16: sku yi rdo rje la sogs dang //
T02TD1880E:108b-19: mchod pa dang ldan zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:108b-20: de ltar rdzogs pa'i bzlas brjod bsgom //
T02TD1880E:108b-21: bzlas pas ngal bar gyur na yang //
T02TD1880E:108b-22: spyan sogs lha mo bzhi rnams kyi //
T02TD1880E:108b-23: dbyangs kyis blang zhing bskul nas ni //
T02TD1880E:108b-24: sngon bzhin dkyil 'khor mchod par bya //
T02TD1880E:108b-25: spyi bor mtho gang tsam du ni //
T02TD1880E:108b-26: mtho gang tsam gyi zla ba bsam //
T02TD1880E:108b-27: de steng zla ba nyi ma la //
T02TD1880E:108b-28: br'um a'am dzr'am kham h'um rnam lnga //
T02TD1880E:108b-29: dri chen rdzas sogs steng du bsam //
T02TD1880E:108b-30: de rnams dbus su aom dkar po //
T02TD1880E:108b-31: de nas rang rang sa bon gyi //
T02TD1880E:108b-32: 'od kyis bde gshegs bkug byas nas //
T02TD1880E:108b-33: zhugs te gcig tu gyur byas la //
T02TD1880E:108b-34: de nas ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:108b-35: sa bon 'od kyis bskul byas nas //
T02TD1880E:108b-36: zhu ste aom gyis reg byas la //
T02TD1880E:108b-37: de rgyun mgo la 'bab bya ste //
T02TD1880E:108b-38: gzi byin ldan par shes par bya //
T02TD1880E:108b-39: de nas skad cig ngal bsos te //
T02TD1880E:108b-40: gong ma lta bu'i cho ga yis //
T02TD1880E:108b-41: gsang sngags bzlas brjod yang bya'o //
T02TD1880E:108b-42: gal te gshegs su gsol 'dod na //
T02TD1880E:108b-43: sngon bzhin mchod dang bstod pa dang //
T02TD1880E:108b-44: bdud rtsi bya ba'i bar byas te //
T02TD1880E:108b-45: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1880E:108b-46: ye shes sems dpa'i skyil 'khor la //
T02TD1880E:108b-47: phyi rol dkyil 'khor zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:108b-48: de nas sdug bsngal ldan pa yi //
T02TD1880E:108b-49: sems can mthong bar byas nas su //
T02TD1880E:108b-50: sngon du smon lam byas pa nyid //
T02TD1880E:108b-51: mngon sum nyid du bsam byas te //
T02TD1880E:108b-52: 'jam pa'i rdo rje sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1880E:108b-53: rang sems dag byas ldes par bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-0: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya @109a * //
T02TD1880E:109a-2: / rang gi sems tsam min pa'i phyir //
T02TD1880E:109a-3: rim bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang //
T02TD1880E:109a-4: mi bskyod pa dang rin chen 'byung //
T02TD1880E:109a-5: snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub //
T02TD1880E:109a-6: yang na 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1880E:109a-7: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' bsam //
T02TD1880E:109a-8: bya ba ma lus byed do cog / lha yi de nyid dag ldan bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-9: de yi thugs kyi zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:109a-10: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
T02TD1880E:109a-11: sems kyis bsam par byas nas su //
T02TD1880E:109a-12: bza' btung bdud rtsir rab byas te //
T02TD1880E:109a-13: gong ma lta bu'i chog ga yis //
T02TD1880E:109a-14: yi ge gsum gyi sngags brjod la //
T02TD1880E:109a-15: lce la rdo rje h'um dkar po //
T02TD1880E:109a-16: de las rdo rje rtse gsum pa //
T02TD1880E:109a-17: bum par h'um gyis mtshan byas te //
T02TD1880E:109a-18: dkyil 'khor lha rnams ma lus par //
T02TD1880E:109a-19: tshim pa'i bsam pas myang bar bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-21: lus ngag yid kyi las rnams kun //
T02TD1880E:109a-22: sems can don la sbyor ba dang //
T02TD1880E:109a-23: sangs rgyas mchod par rnams dag bsam //
T02TD1880E:109a-24: dam tshig nyams pa gso ba'i phyir //
T02TD1880E:109a-25: sna tshogs padmar zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:109a-26: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1880E:109a-27: 'gro rnams rang bzhin dag bsams te //
T02TD1880E:109a-28: rang gi snying gar zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:109a-29: kham las sna tshogs rdo rje ste //
T02TD1880E:109a-30: de dkyil zla bar kham yang bsam //
T02TD1880E:109a-31: de las 'od zer rnams spros pas //
T02TD1880E:109a-32: bde gshegs ma lus bskul byas te //
T02TD1880E:109a-33: de rnams las byung 'od zer las //
T02TD1880E:109a-34: spyan sogs lha mo bcu rnams kyis //
T02TD1880E:109a-35: rang la dbang bskur byas par bsam //
T02TD1880E:109a-36: bla ma brnyas sogs skyon byung na //
T02TD1880E:109a-37: yon dang ldan pa'i mchod bstod dag / bla ma la ni dbul byas te //
T02TD1880E:109a-38: dbang bskur tshogs khrus kyang bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-39: de nas tho rangs dus dang ni //
T02TD1880E:109a-40: nyi ma phyed dang nub pa dang //
T02TD1880E:109a-41: nam phyed dus dang rtse gcig bar //
T02TD1880E:109a-42: de bzhin thams cad bsgom par bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-43: bya bas bskal ba'i rnal 'byor ba //
T02TD1880E:109a-44: tho rangs dus na ting 'dzin gsum ;
T02TD1880E:109a-45: / ma lus par ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1880E:109a-46: de las gzhan pa'i dus na ni //
T02TD1880E:109a-47: bde ba'i ston la 'dug byas te //
T02TD1880E:109a-48: yi dam lha yi snying ga ru //
T02TD1880E:109a-49: mtshan ma la sogs bsam byas la //
T02TD1880E:109a-50: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1880E:109a-51: ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las //
T02TD1880E:109b-0: dam @109b tshigs sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor spro //
T02TD1880E:109b-1: de bzhin dbang pa skur mchod pa dang //
T02TD1880E:109b-2: bstod dang bdud rtsi myang la sogs //
T02TD1880E:109b-3: byas nas sngags kyi bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1880E:109b-5: sngon bzhin mchod dang pa stod pa dang //
T02TD1880E:109b-6: bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar byas te //
T02TD1880E:109b-7: yi ge gsum gyis phyi rol gyi //
T02TD1880E:109b-8: dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:109b-9: 'khor lo nyid la zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:109b-10: gong ma lta bur bya ba rnams //
T02TD1880E:109b-11: ma lus rab tu spyod byed cing //
T02TD1880E:109b-12: nam phyed dus su rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1880E:109b-16: ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs par bya //
T02TD1880E:109b-17: de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig go //
T02TD1880E:109b-18: dkyil 'khor ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1880E:109b-19: 'khor lo la ni zhugs par bya //
T02TD1880E:109b-20: nyal ba'i dus na thabs nyid kyi //
T02TD1880E:109b-21: shes rab ma dang bcas par nyal //
T02TD1880E:109b-22: tho rangs langs pa'i dus na ni //
T02TD1880E:109b-23: lha mos dbyangs kyis bskul nas langs //
T02TD1880E:109b-24: kha dog sna tshogs bsgyur byas la //
T02TD1880E:109b-25: rang gi snying gar zla ba la //
T02TD1880E:109b-26: sa bon mam tsam bsam byas la //
T02TD1880E:109b-27: tha mal ba yi lus nyid ni //
T02TD1880E:109b-28: gong ma lta bus tho rangs kyi //
T02TD1880E:109b-29: dus la sogs par bsgom par byas //
T02TD1880E:109b-30: sgrub thabs 'di ni byas pa yis //
T02TD1880E:109b-31: bsod nams tshogs ni gang thob des //
T02TD1880E:109b-33: 'jam pa'i rdo rje grub gyur cig / slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa'i gsang ba 'dus ba'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa //
T02TD1880E:109b-34: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal kun du bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1880E:109b-36: // / bod yul du bod ris kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po khri mgon btsan gyis yon bdag byas nas //
T02TD1880E:109b-37: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti k'i rtis bsgyur nas gtan la phab ba'o//
